parameters.query: INSERT INTO messages (message_id, content, created_at) VALUES ($1, $2, NOW()) ON CONFLICT (message_id) DO NOTHING

meta.description: âœ… GOOD (Robust): Webhook receives payload. Set node extracts messageId. Postgres INSERT uses ON CONFLICT for guaranteed idempotency.
meta.idempotency_strategy: messageId - robust approach with database constraint
notes: Webhook receives raw payload (e.g., { message_id: 'msg_789', content: '...', ... })
Set node extracts 'messageId' field into workflow variables
FlowLint detects the 'messageId' parameter in Set node upstream of mutation
Postgres INSERT uses ON CONFLICT (message_id) DO NOTHING for guaranteed idempotency
Setup: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_messages_message_id ON messages(message_id)
Production-ready: enforcement at database level, no manual dedup logic needed
